info.title: TooLoo.ai API
info.description: Auto-generated API specification for TooLoo.ai backend routes

get.summary: GET /presets - Get available code generation presets

200.description: Successful response with framework and styling presets

get.summary: GET /figma/status - Check Figma API connection status

post.summary: POST /figma/parse-url - Parse a Figma URL to extract file and node IDs

get.summary: GET /figma/components/{fileId} - Get components from a Figma file
GET /figma/analyze/{fileId} - Analyze a Figma design for code generation

parameters.name: nodeId
parameters.description: Optional specific node ID to analyze

post.summary: POST /figma/export/{fileId} - Export Figma assets as images
POST /figma/make - Generate code from Figma design (main Figma Make endpoint)

400.description: Bad request - Missing URL or invalid configuration

post.summary: POST /figma/sync - Sync existing code with Figma changes

projectPath.description: Path to existing project to sync
